Description.header:
Supplies further API queries by extracting the files for analysis from a project source directory tree.
Params of this query repeats after the general Linux command `find` (please refer `man find` to find out more information)
Description.body:
To make a query:

`echo "0" > api.pmccabe_collector.restapi.org/cc/GET/exec`

To wait and extract the query result:

`cat api.pmccabe_collector.restapi.org/cc/GET/result.txt > <your_filename>.txt`
Description.footer: The typical result of this command is a filtered out source files list which would be the target of further analysis.
